snippet: It was not long ago that James embodied the insular, tone deaf modern superstar, but now he is displaying a level of engagement that celebrated athletes often avoid.
abstract: Miami Heat star LeBron James is showing a growing willingness to take lead on social issues; was among the first to criticize Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling for making offensive racial remarks; it was not long ago that James embodied the insular, tone-deaf modern superstar; now, he is displaying a level of engagement that celebrated athletes often avoid.
lead_paragraph: It was not long ago that James embodied the insular, tone deaf modern superstar, but now he is displaying a level of engagement that celebrated athletes often avoid.

headline.main: LeBron James Shows a Growing Willingness to Take the Lead on Social Issues
headline.print_headline: James Shows a Growing Willingness to Take the Lead on Social Issues
